sentences.sContent: Plant taxonomy and plant systematics may more emphasize on the evolution of plants and their relationships. Its coverage is much broader than dendrology .
sentences.sContent_eng: Plant taxonomy and plant systematics may more emphasize on the evolution of plants and their relationships. Its coverage is much broader than dendrology .
sentences.sCn: 植物分类学和植物系统学则强调植物分类的系统性，强调植物的演化及亲缘关系，涉及植物的范围要比树木学广泛。

trans.tranOther: the branch of botany that is concerned with the natural history of trees and shrubs
